original_text:
Whoever restrains his words has knowledge,
    and he who has a cool spirit is a man of understanding.
korean_text: 말을 아끼는 자는 지식이 있고 성품이 냉철한 자는 명철하니라

sentences.original_text: Whoever restrains his words has knowledge
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 말을 절제하는 사람은 지식이 있다

sentences.original_text: and he who has a cool spirit is a man of understanding
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 마음이 서늘한 자는 명철한 사람이다
